content: blocks total required color key white teal burgundy dusty blue afghan assembly using tapestry needle and appropriate color yarn and stitching through blo assemble the 12 completed blocks into a grid 3 blocks wide by 4 blocks long see photo border round 1 with burgundy yarn join with a slip_stitch to any corner chain 1 space single_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner chain 1 space join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join round 2 chain 3 turn double_crochet in each single_crochet around work 3 double_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain 3 to join round 3 chain 1 turn single_crochet in each double_crochet around work 3 single_crochet in each corner join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet to join finish off weave in loose ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2000 c l halvorson
